item.title: Weekly Worship Preparation
item.dc:creator: Stephen Oharek
item.description: November 26, 2017 Sermons & Hymns Morning Service: Revelation 3:14-22 “Laodicea: The Lukewarm Church” (Pastor Stephen Oharek) Hymn #32 “Great Is Thy Faithfulness” Hymn #521 “My Hope Is Built on Nothing Less” Hymn #9 “All You That Fear Jehovah’s Name” (Ps. 22) Hymn #360 “When in His Might the Lord” (Ps. 126) Evening Service: Deuteronomy … Continue reading Weekly Worship Preparation
item.content:encoded:
November 26, 2017 Sermons & Hymns

Morning Service:
Revelation 3:14-22 “Laodicea: The Lukewarm Church” (Pastor Stephen Oharek)
Hymn #32 “Great Is Thy Faithfulness”
Hymn #521 “My Hope Is Built on Nothing Less”
Hymn #9 “All You That Fear Jehovah’s Name” (Ps. 22)
Hymn #360 “When in His Might the Lord” (Ps. 126)

Evening Service:
Deuteronomy 31:1-29 “After Moses Is Gone” (Pastor Stephen Oharek)
Hymn #112 “Praise Ye, Praise Ye the Lord” (Ps. 148)
Hymn #599 “Savior, like a Shepherd Lead Us”
Hymn #141 “God, in the Gospel of His Son”
Hymn #35 “My God, How Wonderful Thou Art” (Ps. 113)

item.title: Weekly Worship Preparation
item.dc:creator: Stephen Oharek
item.description: November 19, 2017 Sermons & Hymns Morning Service: Revelation 3:7-13 “Philadelphia: The Faithful Church” (Pastor Stephen Oharek) Hymn #38 “Immortal, Invisible, God Only Wise” Hymn #444 “O Zion, Haste, Your Mission High Fulfilling” Hymn #149 “Teach Me, O Lord, Your Way of Truth” (Ps. 119) Hymn #99 “My Song Forever Shall Record” (Ps. 89) Evening … Continue reading Weekly Worship Preparation
item.content:encoded:
November 19, 2017 Sermons & Hymns

Morning Service:
Revelation 3:7-13 “Philadelphia: The Faithful Church” (Pastor Stephen Oharek)
Hymn #38 “Immortal, Invisible, God Only Wise”
Hymn #444 “O Zion, Haste, Your Mission High Fulfilling”
Hymn #149 “Teach Me, O Lord, Your Way of Truth” (Ps. 119)
Hymn #99 “My Song Forever Shall Record” (Ps. 89)

Evening Service:
Deuteronomy 30:1-20 “He Draws Near that We May Draw Near” (Pastor Stephen Oharek)
Hymn #30 “Our God, Our Help in Ages Past” (Ps. 90)
Hymn #558 “That Man Is Blest Who, Fearing God” (Ps. 1)
Hymn #512 “I Lay My Sins on Jesus”
Hymn #622 “I Waited for the Lord Most High” (Ps. 40)

item.description: November 12, 2017 Sermons & Hymns Morning Service: Revelation 3:1-6 “Sardis: The Dying Church” (Pastor Stephen Oharek) Hymn #183 “Awake, My Soul, in Joyful Lays” Hymn #437 “O God, to Us Show Mercy” (Ps. 67) Hymn #169 “My Heart Does Overflow” (Ps. 45) Hymn #370 “Revive Thy Work, O Lord” Evening Service: Deuteronomy 29:1-29 “Will … Continue reading Weekly Worship Preparation
item.content:encoded:
November 12, 2017 Sermons & Hymns

Morning Service:
Revelation 3:1-6 “Sardis: The Dying Church” (Pastor Stephen Oharek)
Hymn #183 “Awake, My Soul, in Joyful Lays”
Hymn #437 “O God, to Us Show Mercy” (Ps. 67)
Hymn #169 “My Heart Does Overflow” (Ps. 45)
Hymn #370 “Revive Thy Work, O Lord”

Evening Service:
Deuteronomy 29:1-29 “Will We Walk with the Lord?” (Pastor Stephen Oharek)
Hymn #73 “Rejoice, All People, Homage Give” (Ps. 47)
Hymn #103 “Holy God, We Praise Your Name”
Hymn #529 “Love Divine, All Loves Excelling”
Hymn #667 “God Is My Strong Salvation” (Ps. 27)

item.content:encoded:
November 5, 2017 Sermons & Hymns

Morning Service:
Second Thessalonians 1:3-12 “Our Vindication and God’s Glory” (Associate Pastor David Chilton)
Hymn #4 “All Praise to God, Who Reigns Above”
Hymn #551 “How Blest is He Whose Trespass” (Ps. 32)
Hymn #248 “Ah, Holy Jesus, How hast Thou Offended”
Hymn #316 “The Mighty God the Lord” (Ps. 50)

Evening Service:
First Peter 4:1-11 “Living for the Will of God” (Mr. Travis Lewis)
Hymn #113 “The Heavens Declare Thy Glory” (Ps. 19)
Hymn #695 “By Grace I Am an Heir of Heaven”
Hymn #138 “The Heavens Declare Your Glory, Lord” (Ps. 19)
Hymn #598 “Guide Me, O Thou Great Jehovah”
